name: Alpha Protocol
summary: The player assumes control of agent Michael Thorton, a new recruit at a clandestine United States agency called Alpha Protocol, which is given unlimited resources to conduct covert operations on behalf of the government. Thorton becomes a rogue agent and must unravel an international conspiracy to stop a war.
info:
• 中文名: 阿尔法协议
  • 开发: Obsidian Entertainment
